articles.author: American Museum of Natural History
articles.title: Fossil study reveals oldest-known evolutionary 'arms race' - Phys.org
articles.description: A study led by researchers at the American Museum of Natural History presents the oldest known example in the fossil record of an evolutionary arms race. These 517-million-year-old predator-prey interactions occurred in the ocean covering what is now South Au…
